listitem.simpara: The UCS packages imported in UCC were updated to the versions in UCS 4.1-2. Patches applied to UCC 2.0 were migrated to UCC 3.0 (if applicable) (41421)
The UCC 3.0 release name is Wuemme (41902)
UCC now uses a slightly updated product logo (41106)
Directory policies are now applied during the image boot and rollout (41427).
The script univention-ucc-force-rw-boot has been added to configure a UCC client to boot in read-write mode (41427).
The OverlayFS mount directory structure and mount options have been adapted to the current OverlayFS version (41526).
There is no continuous network connection from initramfs to NetworkManager start (41599).
The InitRD now verifies that the LDAP DN of the computer object matches the ldap/hostdn of the client, and updates it, if necessary (35411).
Partitions that are created during rollout are now aligned using parted optimal align option (41787).

A new attribute Current image has been added to UCC clients. This non-editable attribute holds the currently installed image of client and is updated by the client during installation and image update (33783).
Rephrased weirdly worded German translations (41936).

The thin client image configuration has been updated to reflect the Ubuntu 16.04 packages and their dependencies (41509). The thin client image size is now 1.70GiB (41509). lxterminal is not replaced by xterm anymore (41509).
univention-ucc-fetch-system-policies now logs its start time (41212).
All upstart init script have been migrated to systemd services (41788).
Predictable network interface names are deactivated by default, legacy naming such as eth0 is used (41602).

Two new &ucsUCR; variables have been introduced, ucc/mount/blacklist to configure a space-separated list of device names which are not mounted (by default the list includes the full partition devices sda sdb sdc sdd sde) and ucc/mount/blacklist/disable to disable the blacklisting. The &ucsUCR; variable ucc/mount/fullpartition has been removed. If ucc/mount/fullpartition was used, the old behavior can be restored by setting the &ucsUCR; variable ucc/mount/blacklist/disable to "true" (41427).

listitem.para:
Various hooks (run-parts) have been added to the XenApp session script (41427).
/usr/share/univention-ucc-session-xenapp/hooks/top.d/ - start of the session script
/usr/share/univention-ucc-session-xenapp/hooks/pre-firefox.d/ - before starting Firefox
/usr/share/univention-ucc-session-xenapp/hooks/post-firefox.d/ - after Firefox finished
/usr/share/univention-ucc-session-xenapp/hooks/bottom.d/ - end of the session script

listitem.simpara: The gstreamer dependencies of univention-ucc-session-xenapp have been updated (41528).
Citrix Receiver has been updated to version 13.3 (41507).
lxsession-logout was added as a dependency to univention-ucc-lxde (41604).
Dynamic Client Drive Mapping has been enabled for the XenApp session (37928).
Support for customizing the session command has been added (firefox/session/cmd) (41427).
Xmessage has been replaced with zenity for status messages (41427).
Support for customizing the session command has been added (rdp/session/cmd) (41427).
Error message logging has been improved: Errors are now logged into the logfile that is shown in the zenity status message dialog (41612).
An update to neutrinordp fixes crashes due to incorrect bitmap cache handling and within the pulseaudio sound module (38695), (39266).
The package univention-ucc-cifshome-pam-mount has been removed (41843).
Added the functionality to execute custom start scripts on clients (41919).
